text:
ClearCaptions (https://www.clearcaptions.com) | Full Time | Software Engineer | REMOTE

There are a few of us in the Denver/Boulder area, but we have colleagues throughout United States.

Technologies in-use include Akka (Java), Python, Asterisk, Kamailio, and OpenStack, among others.
